nudist.name: Nudist
nudist.desc: When wearing armor of class 3 or below, your movement speed is increased by 20% and stamina cost of items is reduced by 40%

bigboned.name: Big Boned
bigboned.desc: The weight of equipped armour is reduced by 85%

nojamthanks.name: No Jam Thanks
nojamthanks.desc: Low durability guns will jam less often, while fixing a jam will prevent further gun from jamming for the following 6 seconds

biteimmune.name: Bite Immune
biteimmune.desc: Attacks from mutants will no longer slow you down

mule.name: Mule
mule.desc: Increases your maximum carry weight by 25kg, and allows you to move at a slow walking speed even when incredibly over-encumbered

eyeforvalue.name: Eye For Value
eyeforvalue.desc: Increases the sale price of items by 7%, and allows you to see those prices during raids

stalker.name: Stalker
stalker.desc: Slows rate at which you absorb radiation by 60% while also decreasing the damage you take from anomalies by 35%

grenadeexpert.name: Grenade Expert
grenadeexpert.desc: Increase the range of your grenades by 50%

bighands.name: Big Hands
bighands.desc: For each empty weapon slot, you gain 20kg max carry capacity and a 5% movement speed increase

xrayview.name: X-Ray View
xrayview.desc: Allows you to see containers through walls

scout.name: Scout
scout.desc: Doubles the number of hidden item stashes

jogger.name: Jogger
jogger.desc: Allows free running if the weight youâ€™re carrying is under 60% of your maximum

favorfromtraders.name: Favor From Traders
favorfromtraders.desc: Doubles the quantity of each item stocked by vendors

nightowl.name: Night Owl
nightowl.desc: Improves your night vision, and also works indoors

doeeyed.name: Doe-Eyed
doeeyed.desc: Increase your view cone size from 90 degrees to 120 degrees

explorer.name: Explorer
explorer.desc: Adds two additional extraction points to each map

fieldmedic.name: Field Medic
fieldmedic.desc: Decreases the amount of time it takes to use meds by 60%

gearlover.name: Gear Lover
gearlover.desc: 40% the durability loss of your weapons and armor

adrenalinerush.name: Adrenaline Rush
adrenalinerush.desc: When your health drops below 25% you will gain a 30% increase in movement speed for 10 seconds. This has a cooldown of 30 seconds

marathonrunner.name: Marathon Runner
marathonrunner.desc: You move 50% faster when not holding a weapon

immortal.name: Immortal
immortal.desc: Once per raid, when something should have killed you, instead you survive and restored with 60hp

scraplord.name: Scrap Lord
scraplord.desc: Increases the amount of material you gain from scrapping items by 50%
